dungeons.name: Crypt of Whispers
dungeons.description: An ancient tomb echoing with cryptic whispers.

room_entrance.name: Stone Entrance
room_entrance.description: A grand stone archway marks the entrance to the crypt. Cold air drifts from within, carrying the faint scent of incense long since burned to ash.

room_hallway.name: Moonlit Hallway
room_hallway.description: A narrow hallway lined with flickering torches. You hear the sound of skittering claws in the darkness.

room_crypt.name: Ancient Crypt
room_crypt.description: Skeletal remains rest in stone sarcophagi. The air is heavy with the magic of ages past.

room_safe.name: Sanctuary Chamber
room_safe.description: A quiet, protected chamber with soft blue runes glowing on the walls. You feel safe here.

room_treasure.name: Treasure Vault
room_treasure.description: Gold and gems glimmer in the torchlight. An ancient artifact rests upon a pedestal. This is the exit.
